Package com.codeborne.selenide

Public API of Selenide

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Command<T>  
    SelenideElement
    Wrapper around WebElement with additional methods like SelenideElement.shouldBe(Condition...) and SelenideElement.shouldHave(Condition...)
    WebDriverProvider
    Interface for using custom WebDriver in your tests

Package com.codeborne.selenide Description

Public API of Selenide

The most important class is Selenide

You can start from this class: import static com.codeborne.selenide.Selenide.*;

Other classes will come automatically with a help of your IDE.
